channel.title: Steam Game Trade (Frozen Synapse + optional Basketball Manager for GMod?)
channel.description:
As the title says, I am trading Steam games. I also can't find the rules section anywhere.
I am offering:
[i][b][url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/98200/]Frozen Synapse[/url][/b][/i] (and [i][b][url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/46740/]Basketball Manager 2010[/url][/b][/i])
for
[b][i][url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/4000/]Garry's Mod[/url][/i][/b]
My steam profile: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/id/76561198012246638/[/url]
(You guys [i]can[/i] see the games in my inventory, right?)

Ok I’ll trade just add me on steam.

-snip-

Something came up, sorry about that.
